name: Plastic Pirates
description:
Plastic Pirates is a game about cleaning up the oceans as quickly as you can. 

Made for the 2019 UKIE Greenjam by Team Dreamteam at UEL. For this game I was working on Programming and UI, as well as some Production.

If you have issues with the resolution, try to zoom out by pressing CTRL and - (minus) at the same time. 

Have fun!
